vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.11.3;
father of: Bathsheba (H1339); also called Ammiel at 1Ch.3.5;
Also named: am.mi.el (עַמִּיאֵל "Ammiel" H5988J)
§ Eliam = "God of the people" or "God is kinsman"
1) Bathsheba's father
2) a Gilonite warrior of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) עַמִּיאֵל   padre de Betsabé, esposa de Urías, David; (b)   hijo de Ahitófel; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以連 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神是親屬"
1) 拔示巴的父親 (撒下 11:3)
2) 一位基羅人, 是大衛王的勇士之一 (撒下 23:34)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以连 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神是亲属"
1) 拔示巴的父亲 (撒下 11:3)
2) 一位基罗人, 是大卫王的勇士之一 (撒下 23:34)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.34;
son of: Ahithophel (H0302)
§ Eliam = "God of the people" or "God is kinsman"
1) Bathsheba's father
2) a Gilonite warrior of David
